segments.text: I see the girl standing there, waiting so patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, her hand outstretched towards her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is trying his best to balance on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really focused on getting those cookies, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman drying the dishes is completely unaware of what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is creating a huge puddle, and it's getting closer to the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous for them, hoping they don't slip or fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will be able to get away with taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything seems on the surface, but there's so much going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
